title: Biden plans face-to-face meeting with China’s Xi Jinping in California
description: With tensions running high, Biden and Xi will look to put relations back on course at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit in November, administration officials say.

title: Grenade fragments found in bodies of Wagner crash victims, Putin says
description: Wreckage from the Aug. 23 crash that killed Yevgeniy Prigozhin showed no “external impact,” the Russian president said, in an apparent denial that the Kremlin ordered the outspoken mercenary leader shot down.

title: At least 80 killed in drone attack on Syrian military academy in Homs
description: A drone attack on a military academy in Homs killed at least 80 people Thursday in one of the deadliest attacks in years in government-held Syria.

title: Biden administration to build new border barriers, citing safety needs
description: The Biden administration said it will bypass environmental and conservation laws for the first time to fast-track barrier construction along the southern border.

title: Three doctors shot dead on popular tourist beach in Rio de Janeiro
description: The doctors were killed and another injured by gunmen in a popular beach area on Thursday.

title: Bedbugs aren’t just in Paris: What to do if they come for you
description: Bloodsucking bedbugs are a global problem. Here’s what to know about bedbugs as the outbreak in Paris sparks concerns for travelers.

title: Strike in Ukraine’s northeast Kharkiv region kills at least 49
description: At least 49 people were killed, including a 6-year-old child, in a strike near Kupyansk, officials said. Witnesses reported seeing a plane before the attack.

title: As U.S. support wobbles, E.U. looks to long-term strategies on Ukraine
description: The conversation on Europe’s future comes at a delicate moment. Ukraine’s progress on the battlefield is slow, and U.S. support suddenly looks shaky.

title: India flash floods leave over 100 people missing: in photos, videos
description: Flash floods triggered by sudden heavy rainfall brought disaster to northeastern India, in Sikkim state, killing more than a dozen people.

title: England considers raising smoking age until cigarettes are banned entirely
description: “A 14-year-old today will never legally be sold a cigarette,” said Prime Minister Rishi Sunak of his bid to impose a phased ban on tobacco products, like in New Zealand.

title: U.K. prime minister on gender: ‘A man is a man and a woman is a woman’
description: In a speech, Rishi Sunak said the stance was “common sense,” drawing applause from the Conservative Party Conference and accusations of transphobia from activists.

title: How government neglect, misguided policies doomed Libya to deadly floods
description: Video evidence shows evacuations being carried out among coastal communities in Derna, prompting many people to move inland — and into the path of the coming flood.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Biden expresses worry about congressional tumult’s effect on Ukraine aid
description: President Biden said he “does worry” that Washington’s political disarray could affect Ukraine aid, after the House speaker was ousted this week.

title: Pakistan abruptly turns against Afghan refugees, calls for deportations
description: Pakistan wants to deport up to 1.7 million Afghans amid mounting frustration with the Taliban and concern over the economic burden of hosting refugees.
